Compression Fitted Semi-Fitted Loose Quantity:In Stock 12345678910111213141516 Add to Cart Built from your favorite UA StudioLux® fabric, these spin shorts are soft, incredibly supportive, and loaded with a bunch of amazing details. We moved the seams around to eliminate chafing, while keeping your curves on point. There’s reflective tape on the leg in case you want to take your spin on the road. And we added a hidden waist and leg pocket to keep your stuff safe and secure.
